00036 #ifndef INCL_EVENT_CONSTANTS
00037 #define INCL_EVENT_CONSTANTS
00038 
00040 //
00041 // Event Codes
00042 //
00043 
00044 //Sync Events
00045 #define SYNC_BEGIN                  0x0001
00046 #define SYNC_END                    0x0002
00047 #define SYNC_ERROR                  0x0003
00048 #define SEND_INITIALIZATION         0x0004
00049 #define SEND_MODIFICATION           0x0005
00050 #define SEND_FINALIZATION           0x0006
00051 
00052 //Transport Events
00053 #define SEND_DATA_BEGIN             0x0011
00054 #define SEND_DATA_END               0x0012
00055 #define RECEIVE_DATA_BEGIN          0x0013
00056 #define DATA_RECEIVED               0x0014
00057 #define RECEIVE_DATA_END            0x0015
00058 
00059 //Sync Source Events
00060 #define SYNC_SOURCE_BEGIN              0x0021
00061 #define SYNC_SOURCE_END                0x0022
00062 #define SYNC_SOURCE_SYNCMODE_REQUESTED 0x0023
00063 #define SYNC_SOURCE_TOTAL_CLIENT_ITEMS 0x0024
00064 #define SYNC_SOURCE_TOTAL_SERVER_ITEMS 0x0025
00065 
00066 //Sync Item Events
00067 #define ITEM_ADDED_BY_SERVER        0x0031
00068 #define ITEM_DELETED_BY_SERVER      0x0032
00069 #define ITEM_UPDATED_BY_SERVER      0x0033
00070 #define ITEM_ADDED_BY_CLIENT        0x0034
00071 #define ITEM_DELETED_BY_CLIENT      0x0035
00072 #define ITEM_UPDATED_BY_CLIENT      0x0036
00073 
00074 //Sync Status Events
00075 #define CLIENT_STATUS               0x0041
00076 #define SERVER_STATUS               0x0042
00077 
00078 
00079 #define DIM_ERROR_MSG               1024
00080 #define DIM_COMMAND                 128
00081 
00082 //Listener Families
00083 #define SYNC_LISTENER               0
00084 #define SYNC_SOURCE_LISTENER        1
00085 #define SYNC_STATUS_LISTENER        2
00086 #define SYNC_TRANSPORT_LISTENER     3
00087 #define SYNC_ITEM_LISTENER          4
00088 
00089 
00091 #endif
